b:if.script: { "@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "LodgingBusiness", "name": "", "description": "", "url": "", "address": { "@type": "PostalAddress", "streetAddress": "Iqbal Colony Road, Tangmarg", "addressLocality": "Baramulla", "addressRegion": "Jammu and Kashmir", "postalCode": "193402", "addressCountry": "IN" }, "telephone": "+91-70065-08551", "starRating": { "@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "4.3", "bestRating": "5" }, "amenityFeature": [ {"@type": "LocationFeatureSpecification", "name": "Free Parking"}, {"@type": "LocationFeatureSpecification", "name": "Free WiFi"}, {"@type": "LocationFeatureSpecification", "name": "Breakfast"}, {"@type": "LocationFeatureSpecification", "name": "Garden"}, {"@type": "LocationFeatureSpecification", "name": "24-hour front desk"} ] }

div.p: Find warm Kashmiri hospitality at Conifer View Guest House
Tangmarg - Gateway to Gulmarg
30-40 minutes drive to gondola & skiing
4.3/5 on MakeMyTrip | 8.8/10 on Booking.com
Private on-site parking included
Traditional Kashmiri hospitality

Conifer View Guest House is a cozy mountain homestay in Tangmarg — the peaceful gateway to Gulmarg. Set on Iqbal Colony Road, the house offers warm Kashmiri hospitality, clean rooms, and views of pine-clad slopes.

It's a practical base for gondola rides, skiing in winter, and day trips to Drung Waterfall and Ningle Nallah. Our family-run guest house provides a "feel at home while away from home" experience with traditional Kashmiri warmth.
Hosted by Mohammad Imran Khan since 2023, we ensure every guest receives personalized attention and assistance with local arrangements, making your Kashmir journey unforgettable.
Private on-site parking for all guests
Vegetarian, Halal & Kosher options available
Beautiful garden with sun terrace & outdoor fireplace
Stay connected throughout your stay
Always available to assist you
Close to skiing areas & gondola

div.style: display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr)); gap: 2rem;

background: #fff3cd; border: 1px solid #ffeaa7; border-radius: var(--border-radius); padding: 2rem; margin-top: 3rem; text-align: center;
div.p: Traveling in winter? The Tangmarg–Gulmarg road can require snow chains or 4×4 vehicles after fresh snowfall. Contact us for the latest road conditions before you travel.

div.style: display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 4rem; align-items: center;
height: 400px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--secondary-color)); border-radius: var(--border-radius);

div.p: "This was a beautiful hotel with amazing staff. The location is perfect for exploring Gulmarg and the hospitality was exceptional."
- Pankaj, India
"This homestay was the highlight of my Kashmir trip. If you're looking for a traditional Kashmiri house with valley views, this is the best one."
- Priyanka Aiwale
"Neat and clean property with affordable price. Caretaker is very humble and helpful. Highly recommended for families visiting Kashmir."
- Deepak Rathore

Iqbal Colony Road, Tangmarg
Baramulla, J&K 193402

Mohammad Imran Khan
Response within 24 hours
1:00 PM - 6:00 PM / Until 11:00 AM
Valid ID required (18+ for primary guest)
No smoking, No pets, No parties
Get the best rates by booking directly with us. We also accept bookings through:

div.style: background: white; margin-bottom: 1rem; border-radius: 10px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: var(--shadow);
padding: 1.5rem; font-weight: 600; color: var(--primary-color); border-bottom: 1px solid #eee; cursor: pointer;

div.div: How far is Conifer View from Gulmarg?
About 11–14 km by road (≈30–40 minutes, traffic & snow dependent).

div.style: background: white; margin-bottom: 1rem; border-radius: 10px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: var(--shadow);
padding: 1.5rem; font-weight: 600; color: var(--primary-color); border-bottom: 1px solid #eee; cursor: pointer;

div.div: Yes, free private parking is available on site for all guests.

div.style: background: white; margin-bottom: 1rem; border-radius: 10px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: var(--shadow);

div.div: Yes — in-room breakfast with vegetarian, halal, and kosher options available.

div.style: background: white; margin-bottom: 1rem; border-radius: 10px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: var(--shadow);

div.div: Do you help with local tours or gondola tickets?
Yes, our 24-hour front desk and tour assistance can help arrange taxis, local tours, and provide guidance for gondola tickets and ski rentals.
